entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vanderhoof
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. James 09:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
